verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: In 2017] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: appointed] [ARG1: Mick Mulvaney] [ARG2: as the acting head of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau] . Learn how the CFPB has changed under his leadership .
